pr_title: [FLINK-16047][table-planner-blink] Fix Blink planner produces wrong aggregate results with state clean up

timeline.message:
[FLINK-16047][table-planner-blink] Fix Blink planner produces wrong aggregate results with state clean up

This picks the implementation and tests from FLINK-10674.

timeline.bodyText:
What is this test for?
Without this fix, it will occasional fail?
timeline.author: JingsongLi
timeline.diffHunk:

     val expected = List("1,1,50", "1,ALL,50")
     assertEquals(expected.sorted, sink.getRetractResults.sorted)
   }
+

replies.bodyText: As I said in the description, this PR is cherry picked  from FLINK-10674, including this test. And this test can pass without the changes. I'm also fine to remove this test.
replies.author: wuchong

replies.bodyText: We already have testMinMaxWithRetraction to test DistinctWithRetraction, so I think we can remove it.
replies.author: JingsongLi
